text.div:
Activated partial thromboplastin time

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14979-9 Activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation assay
    16631-4 Activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) in Blood by Coagulation 1:1 saline
    3173-2 Activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) in Blood by Coagulation assay
    43734-3 Activated partial thromboplastin time (aPTT) in Platelet poor plasma by Coagulation 1:1 saline
